Workflow.Name: Review Hub - Add Users to New Group - Admin&Operators
Workflow.Description: The flow adds newly added Admins to the security group used for administrative access control. Flow failure will result in new Admins not having access to carry out necessary administrative tasks on the system.

LocalizedName.description: Review Hub - Add Users to New Group - Admin&Operators

Description.description: The flow adds newly added Admins to the security group used for administrative access control. Flow failure will result in new Admins not having access to carry out necessary administrative tasks on the system.
